::KitKat::
She walked out of her quarters and down the hall. She stopped just 
outside the door and listened.  She overheard parts of the 
conversation. She transformed into wolf mode and walked out the front 
door to the base.  She walked around the rock walls and over to a 
trees where she layed down under it.  She was doubting everything she 
thought she knew.  She wasn't sure what was going on.  Why was she 
thinking all of a sudden that Megatron wasn't a good leader? Why or 
where was she getting the idea that she could lead? She had never led 
anyone into anything. Nor had she ever had the chance to do so.  She 
wanted to lead and bring glory to the Predacons, not this confusion.  
She started to wonder if all the things that had gone wrong were her 
fault or not.
